item.title: Animation in Matplotlib?
item.description: In this tiny piece of post I’m gonna post how you can make animations using the matplotlib module in Python. Things get much more intuitive when they move, don’t they? We’re here trying to plot two (thick) sine curves which have different offsets on the x-axis direction, and those offsets increases with an indicator called frame_no. import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from matplotlib.animation import FuncAnimation plt.rcParams['animation.html'] = 'html5' x = np.
